subject: Golf
PGA Championship
lead_paragraph: Jason Dufner, who lost the 2011 P.G.A. Championship in a playoff, closes with a two-under 68 and beats Jim Furyk by two strokes.
snippet: Jason Dufner, who lost the 2011 P.G.A. Championship in a playoff, closes with a two-under 68 and beats Jim Furyk by two strokes.
